sentences.chinese: 但是科技，也許纔是不朽。

sentences.english: That particular screenshot mentioned shows off a visceral fight between Marauders and Immortals.
sentences.chinese: 這張截屏展示了掠奪者和不朽者的激烈戰鬥。

sentences.english: He would immortalize her in a poem.
sentences.chinese: 他會在詩歌裏讓她不朽。

sentences.english: And we shall experience love stories that will last forever.
sentences.chinese: 我們還將會體驗到千古不朽的愛情故事。

sentences.english: No freedom without sacrifice, endless blood perpetuated convictions of our national dignity. (UTOYXC)
sentences.chinese: 爲自由而流的血，鑄成永垂不朽的民族尊嚴。

sentences.english: The owner is far more immortal in that sense, close to the immortality, you know.
sentences.chinese: 在這種意義上主人更不朽，接近不朽，我的意思是。

sentences.english: The owner is far more immortal in that sense, close to the immortality, you know.
sentences.chinese: 在這種意義上主人更不朽，接近不朽，我的意思是。

sentences.english: This little snake had a tougher customer the other day in the bit of eternity it was trying to swallow.
sentences.chinese: 那天，這難纏傢伙成爲小蛇難以下嚥的不朽片斷。

sentences.english: But its indelible characters and set-pieces still deserve mention.
sentences.chinese: 然而書中不朽的人物和場景設置仍值得一提。

sentences.english: Is immortal, even for a moment is fleeting that we love.
sentences.chinese: 不朽的是我們，須臾的是我們轉瞬即逝那愛情。

sentences.english: Premier Zhou's illustrious deeds are an everlasting monument in the hearts of the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 周總理的光輝業績在中國人民心中立下了不朽的豐碑。

sentences.english: A man can never die who enjoys immortal nourishment.
sentences.chinese: 樂享不朽的營養之人是不死之人。

sentences.english: Most eternities symbolise the continuation of the man's love for his wife.
sentences.chinese: 最三不朽象徵承接該男子的妻子愛。

sentences.english: Like many others before me, I have experienced "intimations of immortality."
sentences.chinese: 像許多我的前輩一樣，我經歷過過“不朽的暗示”。

sentences.english: Einstein has performed immortal feats for bringing forward the time of terminating the Second World War.
sentences.chinese: 愛因斯坦爲二戰的結束時間提前，立下了不朽的功勳。

sentences.english: It troubles you for an hour, it repays you by immortality .
sentences.chinese: 它打擾你一小時，償還給你的卻是不朽的生命。

definition: to fall down/to decay/to fall from the sky/to die
eternal/everlasting/fig. to pass into eternity (i.e. to die)
the most honorable/the most respected/supreme/(archaic) the emperor
throughout time/from ancient times (up to the present)
god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
to stand aloof/to be detached from/to transcend worldliness/untrammeled/unconventional
